data.message: Etty Benartzy, I don't know you but...there are MANY pro Israeli pages. I know IDF posts alot. The people at the church I attend are pro Israel as I have been my whole life. Don't let the ignorant get you down. And ALWAYS know this...if ANYONE says they love God and has hate for ANYONE due to race, creed, religion, color, gender, you name it, well........they really DON'T love God or know Him.
